1370: Marie was born in In den Haeg in 1370.
Got married to Reymar at age 19 in 1370.
Gave birth to Blomart in 1370 at age 19.
1372: Gave birth to Lutgeri in 1372 at age 21.
1373: Gave birth to Oderada in 1373 at age 22.
1374: Gave birth to Reynerus in 1374 at age 23.
1376: Gave birth to Rolekine in 1376 at age 25.
1377: Gave birth to Salomon in 1377 at age 26.
1378: Lost son Rolekine when Rolekine was 3 years old.
1381: Gave birth to Woltwigis in 1381 at age 30.
1384: Lost daughter Woltwigis when Woltwigis was 4 years old.
1391: Lost daughter Oderada when Oderada was 19 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
